message: I propose a fair 90/10 split. I believe in sharing the wealth, but also want to maximize my gains. Let's work together!
I'm willing to compromise, but I want a bigger share. Can we meet in the middle?
I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but 60/40 is the most I can offer. Let's settle this and avoid further losses due to inflation.
I'm not willing to accept 40% less than my original share. I want a better deal. Let's try again.
